resources.string: Swiping is the easiest way to navigate Classroom Hero. Try swiping now!
Students stamp this screen to earn points! Select a positive action that you would like to reinforce.
Students stamp this screen to purchase items! Collaborate with your students to create a marketplace filled with items or privileges they want.
Motivate your entire class by adding points to the class jar! Only the teacher can stamp this screen!
Stamp this screen with your stamp to begin!
